thread.title: Gavin Comrie
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Gavin Comrie

author: Gavin Comrie
title: Gavin Comrie
text: one little niggle with using servicing stop ,the garage used was to far away , put 65 miles onto the mileage of car not forgetting the cost for fuel,and in doing so didn't get car back till after 9 pm , weather did have part to play and the Edinburgh ring road can be a problem especially early mornings,if garage closer would not have been aproblem ,apart from that everything was fine kept informed to what was going on, as to servicing and mot ,would use again if told which garage they will be using
